table.searchString: sourcetype="netwitness_log" SDK-Query| rex field=_raw "query=\"(?<query>.*)\"" |eval user=username."@".src_ip| stats count values(user) as Users by query| sort - count
table.title: Query Calls by User (Last 24 hours)
Longest running Value Calls by Duration (Last 24 hours - Over 3 seconds)

search.query: sourcetype="netwitness_log" SDK-Values finished |rex field=_raw " execute (?<duration>[^\,)]*)\)" |rex field=_raw "where=\"(?<where>.+)\"" | eval where=if(isnull(where),"All Data",where) | eval user=username."@".src_ip |eval sduration=duration | convert dur2sec(sduration) | where sduration > 3 | stats values(user) as Users values(fieldName) as Fields values(where) as Where by duration | sort - duration

table.title: Longest running Query Calls by Duration (Last 24 hours)

search.query: sourcetype="netwitness_log" SDK-Query finished | rex field=_raw "execute (?<duration>[^\,)]*)\):.*?query=\"(?<query>.*)\"" | eval query=if(isnull(query),"All Data",query) | eval user=username."@".src_ip |eval sduration=duration | convert dur2sec(sduration) | where sduration > 0 | stats values(query) as Query values(user) as Users by duration| sort - duration

table.searchString: sourcetype="netwitness_log" audit Login Failed | rex field=_raw "user \'(?<username>[^\']+)\' from (?<src_ip>[^:]+):(?<src_port>\d+)" | stats count by username src_ip | sort - count
table.title: Failed Logins (Last 24 hours)

table.searchString: sourcetype="netwitness_log" level="failure" NOT "LCD is not responding"| rex field=_raw "\[failure\] (?<error>.*)" | eval device=module."@".host | stats count by device error | sort - count
table.title: Failures by Host (Last 7 days)
